title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repository providing the core CLI and server to pull, build, and run large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama, wrapping the REST API with convenient async/sync methods.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript / TypeScript client for Node.js and browsers to interact with the Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration enabling Ollama models as LLM, chat, and embedding providers.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama with multi-model chat, file uploads, and admin panel.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java / Kotlin client library for Ollama offering synchronous and asynchronous APIs.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem providing idiomatic access to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Lightweight Go CLI wrapper around Ollama for scripting and automation tasks.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local AI code completion via Ollama models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration allowing Ollama models as generators and embedders in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with strongly-typed models and both sync/async APIs.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Minimal cross-platform desktop GUI for Ollama built with Tauri and React.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images and compose files for running Ollama server in containers.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes clusters.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Template repository showcasing retrieval-augmented generation using Ollama and ChromaDB.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams responses from local Ollama models into Discord channels.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app integrating Ollama models as conversational bots with thread support.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package distributing the ollama-js client library.

title: ollama PyPI
summary: Official Python package published on PyPI for integrating Ollama models.

title: ollama-huggingface
summary: Utility to convert and push Hugging Face models into the Ollama model library format.
